front.title: MPLS Data Plane Encapsulation for In-situ OAM Data

abstract.t: In-situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) records operational and telemetry information in the data packet while the packet traverses a path between two nodes in the network. This document defines how IOAM data fields are transported using the MPLS data plane encapsulation, including Segment Routing (SR) with MPLS data plane (SR-MPLS).
